titles.title: Child and Dependent Care Modernization Act of 2019

To amend the Internal Revenue Code to increase the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance and to allow individuals to carry forward dependent care flexible spending arrangement account balances.
Child and Dependent Care Modernization Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Child and Dependent Care Modernization Act of 2019
This bill increases the tax exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance and allows individuals to carry forward into the next taxable year unused flexible spending arrangement account balances
